shortDescription: Todd Miller's sudo version 1.8.20 and earlier is vulnerable to an input validation (embedded spaces) in the get_process_ttyname() function resulting in information disclosure and command execution.
vulnerabilityName: Sudo Sudo Concurrent Execution using Shared Resource with Improper Synchronization ('Race Condition')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
